name: Presso Network
description:
The way we are networking is changing. No longer do we want 1000 business cards in our pockets hoping to finally meet the right people at an event. Now we want to make the most of our valuable and limited time and only attend the right events. 
That is why at PressoNetwork we’re bringing smarter networking to the time aware networkers who want to make the most of their every day.
We do all this while providing a smarter and more efficient platform for the companies to reach their target audience, attract the right people to their events and optimize the experience for their attendees. All while managing their contacts in a better way and gather valuable analytics and statistics that they can bring straight to their investor and sponsors and show why they are the perfect fit for them.

team.title: COO

team.bioHtml: Founder @Neos Chronos. Trilingual with PhD in Software Engineering & Cryptography. Strong international sales background. Passionately curious, always learning.

jobs.title: Sales Representative
jobs.description:
Description

At Presso Network we make networking smarter. 

We offer an advanced event networking service (SaaS) that enables event organisers to gain deep insights into audiences and event performance, in order to refine the experience they offer to attract the right attendees and sponsors. Presso’s App acts as a real-time event assistant, helping attendees network effectively, providing logistics advice, and connecting attendees with speakers during event sessions. It is also an everyday networking tool, putting users in touch with people they have met, helping to build long-lasting and meaningful connections.

We are supported by a Virgin Startup Loan and have successfully delivered towards major events like The Retail Summit 2019 in Dubai, who have become a recurring client.

Job Brief

We are now looking for an accomplished outside sales representative in Greater London, to shape and deliver Presso’s sales strategy from customer acquisition to sales closing, and customer success. You will be driving the next phase in Presso’s growth and, depending on your performance, you are set to become Presso’s future Sales Director.

Your Responsibilities

Shape Presso’s sales strategy together with the team
Execute Presso’s sales strategy
Turn marketing qualified leads and own-sourced leads into a qualified sales pipeline
Develop a sales forecast
Close sales according to forecast
Be the customer’s voice, providing feedback to help improve Presso

You will be successful in this role if you have

3+ years experience with software / SaaS sales, specifically in the event management sector
A provable record of delivered projects and satisfied customers. An extensive network with the London event management sector is a plus
Familiarity with different sales techniques and pipeline management
Good knowledge of CRM systems and Office Tools


This role will be fun for you if you

Are a good communicator
Enjoy working collaboratively in a team, using each one’s strengths to generate great outcomes.
Are open-minded, curious and eager to learn.
See working in a fast-paced environment as an opportunity to apply your creativity and problem-solving skills.
Expect accountability
Lead by example.

Benefits

This is a commission-based role. In return for your commitment and enthusiasm, you can expect

Company equity share depending on qualifications, experience, and level of commitment 
An entrepreneurial, exciting & friendly work environment
Flexible working conditions
Extensive professional growth and networking opportunities
